feed.title: Minio Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Minio: Bugfix Release
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: warning for decommissioned pool while start by @jiuker in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20019
  • Letting password enable auth bypass caPublicKey (only if passauth is â€¦ by @zveinn in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20022
  • heal: Add support of healing particular pool/set by @vadmeste in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20024
  • Add batch status API by @vadmeste in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19679
  • tests: Fix setting max openfds as memory limit by @vadmeste in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20029
  • Fix SkipReader performance with small initial read by @klauspost in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20030
  • info: Always refresh the root disk status by @vadmeste in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20023
  • do not proxy invalid object names by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20031
  • resume any batch jobs in a goroutine by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20035
  • Tier update: return a better error when incorrect credentials or other error encountered by @marktheunissen in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20034
  • Remove license update job by @anjalshireesh in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20037
  • Log ILM failed object name by @klauspost in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20040

New Contributors

  • @marktheunissen made their first contribution in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20034

Full Changelog: https://github.com/minio/minio/compare/RELEASE.2024-06-29T01-20-47Z...RELEASE.2024-07-04T14-25-45Z

entry.title: New release for Minio: Bugfix Release
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add typos check to Makefile by @vadmeste in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20051
  • Abstract grid connections by @klauspost in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20038
  • Fix documentation for removal of delete markers ILM rule by @allanrogerr in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20056
  • batch: Update job info object on success by @krisis in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20053
  • Log replication errors once by @shtripat in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20063
  • list: Hide objects/versions with pending/failed replicated deletion by @vadmeste in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20047
  • Clarify post policy error message by @klauspost in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20067
  • heal: List and heal again for any listing error by @vadmeste in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/19999
  • clarify error message for root user credential by @austin880625 in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20043
  • Add groups to policy entities by @taran-p in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20052

New Contributors

  • @austin880625 made their first contribution in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20043

Full Changelog: https://github.com/minio/minio/compare/RELEASE.2024-07-04T14-25-45Z...RELEASE.2024-07-10T18-41-49Z

entry.title: New release for Minio: RELEASE.2024-07-13T01-46-15Z
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • hide some deprecated fields from 'get' output by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20069
  • Audit failure in batch job key rotate by @allanrogerr in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20073
  • Add DecodeDN and QuickNormalizeDN functions to LDAP config by @taran-p in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20076
  • Updated dependencies for ARM SVE support by @fwessels in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20081
  • replication: make large workers configurable by @poornas in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20077
  • Fix ListObjects aborting after 3 minute on async request by @klauspost in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20074
  • Bump github.com/nats-io/nats-streaming-server from 0.24.3 to 0.24.6 by @dependabot in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20082
  • do not print unexpected logs by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20083
  • Update Console to v1.6.3 by @bexsoft in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20084

Full Changelog: https://github.com/minio/minio/compare/RELEASE.2024-07-10T18-41-49Z...RELEASE.2024-07-13T01-46-15Z

entry.title: New release for Minio: RELEASE.2024-07-15T19-02-30Z
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: typo in BucketUsageMetrics group registration in v3 metrics by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20090
  • Removed user and group details from logs by @shtripat in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20072
  • add validation test for v3 metrics for all its endpoints by @harshavardhana in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20094
  • Split handleMessages (cosmetic) by @klauspost in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20095

Full Changelog: https://github.com/minio/minio/compare/RELEASE.2024-07-13T01-46-15Z...RELEASE.2024-07-15T19-02-30Z

entry.title: New release for Minio: RELEASE.2024-07-16T23-46-41Z
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Allow a KMS Action to specify keys in the Resources of a policy by @marktheunissen in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20079
  • Update reedsolomon dependency with fix for Graviton4 processor by @fwessels in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20102
  • replication: proxy only on missing object or read quorum err by @poornas in https://github.com/minio/minio/pull/20101

Full Changelog: https://github.com/minio/minio/compare/RELEASE.2024-07-15T19-02-30Z...RELEASE.2024-07-16T23-46-41Z
